name: File Save Automation
description: Automatically validate and update documentation when files are saved

triggers.message:
A Bicep template was saved at {filePath}. Please:
1. Validate the template syntax and parameters
2. Extract parameter information for documentation
3. Check if README.md exists and update parameter table
4. Suggest blog article connections if this is new content
5. Recommend BLOG-TO-CODE-MAPPING.md updates if applicable

A PowerShell script was saved at {filePath}. Please:
1. Check syntax and validate comment-based help
2. Verify parameter validation and error handling
3. Update or create README.md using the PowerShell template
4. Suggest blog article connections for new scripts
5. Check if BLOG-TO-CODE-MAPPING.md needs updates

A README file was updated at {filePath}. Please:
1. Validate all links (blog articles, internal references)
2. Check formatting and template compliance
3. Verify parameter documentation matches actual files
4. Suggest related resources that might be missing
